div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2375 Valence, 90 km. S of Lyon, 1902 (1155) Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 415 AR. Pot hoard Massalia: ob. Gallic: 15 Disposition: E. Poncet 20 Poncet, RN 1903, pp. 87-99, illus. Blanchet, Trait√©, p. 553, no. 59 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 48 (18 obols examined)
